alert.note: Alert for Cass; Mason (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 10:08AM CDT until April 05 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lincoln IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois... Sangamon River near Chandlerville affecting Cass and Mason Counties. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sangamon River near Chandlerville. * WHEN...From Friday evening to Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 452.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 457.5 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 456.6 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Sangamon River Chandlerville 456.6 452.3 Thu 10 am CD 455.9 457.3 457.4 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
